title: Ferdinand believes there is ´no way back´ for Rashford at Man Utd
description: Rio Ferdinand has warned Marcus Rashford there is “no way back for him” at Manchester United following Ruben Amorim’s comments on his professionalism. Rashford has not featured for United since a 3-2 defeat at Old Trafford to Nottingham Forest in the Premier League back on December 12. title: Burnley 0-0 Leeds United: Visitors stay top after drab Turf Moor stalemate
description: Leeds United moved two points clear at the Championship summit after playing out a drab goalless draw with Burnley at Turf Moor on Monday.
